response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for both of us. This unique item is worth $1,200,000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. This represents a substantial savings compared to its true worth, making it an exceptional deal for you. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Thank you for considering this extraordinary opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
